SELECT count(*) AS CNT FROM( SELECT USER_NO , SUM(SUBTOTAL) AS SUBTOTAL , SUM(MISTOTAL) AS MISTOTAL FROM(
SELECT USER_NO , 0 AS SUBTOTAL , SUM(MISTOTAL) AS MISTOTAL FROM ( SELECT USER_NO, SUM(MIS_ATT_NO) AS MISTOTAL FROM ( SELECT USER_NO , COUNT(MIS_ATT_NO)*3 AS MIS_ATT_NO FROM TBL_MIS_ATT GROUP BY USER_NO UNION SELECT USER_NO , SUM(MIS_ATT_TIMES)*3 AS MIS_ATT_NO FROM TBL_MIS_SCORE GROUP BY USER_NO UNION SELECT USER_NO, 0 AS MIS_ATT_NO FROM TBL_USER WHERE AUTHORITY != 1 GROUP BY USER_NO ) GROUP BY USER_NO ) GROUP BY USER_NO
UNION
SELECT USER_NO , SUM(AC_SCORE) AS SUBTOTAL , 0 AS MISTOTAL FROM ( SELECT U.USER_NO , SUM(TOEIC) AS AC_SCORE FROM TBL_CONVERSION_SCORE C, TBL_APPLY A, TBL_SUBJECT S, TBL_USER U WHERE (A.USER_NO = U.USER_NO AND C.TOEFL = A.AC_SCORE AND A.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO AND S.SUB_NAME = 'TOEFL') OR (A.USER_NO = U.USER_NO AND C.TEPS = A.AC_SCORE AND A.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO AND S.SUB_NAME = 'TEPS') OR (A.USER_NO = U.USER_NO AND C.TOEIC_S = A.AC_SCORE AND A.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO AND S.SUB_NAME = 'TOEIC Speaking') GROUP BY U.USER_NO UNION SELECT U.USER_NO , SUM(AC_SCORE) AS AC_SCORE FROM TBL_APPLY A, TBL_USER U WHERE A.USER_NO = U.USER_NO AND APPLY_STATE = '승인' GROUP BY U.USER_NO UNION SELECT U.USER_NO , -SUM(AC_SCORE) AS AC_SCORE FROM TBL_APPLY A, TBL_SUBJECT S, TBL_USER U WHERE A.USER_NO = U.USER_NO AND A.APPLY_STATE = '승인' AND( (A.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO AND S.SUB_NAME = 'TOEFL') OR (A.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO AND S.SUB_NAME = 'TEPS') OR (A.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO AND S.SUB_NAME = 'TOEIC Speaking') ) GROUP BY U.USER_NO UNION SELECT USER_NO, 0 AS AC_SCORE FROM TBL_USER WHERE AUTHORITY != 1 GROUP BY USER_NO ) GROUP BY USER_NO
UNION
SELECT USER_NO, 0 AS SUBTOTAL, 0 AS MISTOTAL FROM TBL_USER WHERE AUTHORITY != 1 GROUP BY USER_NO ) GROUP BY USER_NO) A , TBL_USER U WHERE A.USER_NO = U.USER_NO

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_NAME , U.GRADE , U.STATE , A.SUBTOTAL , A.MISTOTAL , (SUBTOTAL+MISTOTAL) AS TOTAL FROM( SELECT USER_NO , SUM(SUBTOTAL) AS SUBTOTAL , SUM(MISTOTAL) AS MISTOTAL FROM( SELECT USER_NO , 0 AS SUBTOTAL , SUM(MISTOTAL) AS MISTOTAL FROM ( SELECT USER_NO, SUM(MIS_ATT_NO) AS MISTOTAL FROM( SELECT USER_NO , COUNT(MIS_ATT_NO)*3 AS MIS_ATT_NO FROM TBL_MIS_ATT GROUP BY USER_NO UNION SELECT USER_NO , SUM(MIS_ATT_TIMES)*3 AS MIS_ATT_NO FROM TBL_MIS_SCORE GROUP BY USER_NO UNION SELECT USER_NO, 0 AS MIS_ATT_NO FROM TBL_USER WHERE AUTHORITY != 1 GROUP BY USER_NO ) GROUP BY USER_NO ) GROUP BY USER_NO UNION SELECT USER_NO , SUM(AC_SCORE) AS SUBTOTAL , 0 AS MISTOTAL FROM ( SELECT A.USER_NO , SUM(TOEIC) AS AC_SCORE FROM TBL_CONVERSION_SCORE C, TBL_APPLY A, TBL_SUBJECT S WHERE (A.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND C.TOEFL = A.AC_SCORE AND A.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO AND S.SUB_NAME = 'TOEFL') OR (A.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND C.TEPS = A.AC_SCORE AND A.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO AND S.SUB_NAME = 'TEPS') OR (A.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND C.TOEIC_S = A.AC_SCORE AND A.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO AND S.SUB_NAME = 'TOEIC Speaking') GROUP BY USER_NO UNION SELECT USER_NO , SUM(AC_SCORE) AS AC_SCORE FROM TBL_APPLY WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND APPLY_STATE = '승인' GROUP BY USER_NO UNION SELECT A.USER_NO , -SUM(AC_SCORE) AS AC_SCORE FROM TBL_APPLY A, TBL_SUBJECT S WHERE A.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND A.APPLY_STATE = '승인' AND( (A.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO AND S.SUB_NAME = 'TOEFL') OR (A.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO AND S.SUB_NAME = 'TEPS') OR (A.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO AND S.SUB_NAME = 'TOEIC Speaking') ) GROUP BY USER_NO ) GROUP BY USER_NO UNION SELECT USER_NO, 0 AS SUBTOTAL, 0 AS MISTOTAL FROM TBL_USER WHERE AUTHORITY != 1 GROUP BY USER_NO ) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} GROUP BY USER_NO) A , TBL_USER U WHERE A.USER_NO = U.USER_NO

SELECT S.CATEG , S.AREA , S.SUB_NAME , A.AC_DATE , A.AC_SCORE , NVL((SELECT TOEIC FROM TBl_CONVERSION_SCORE C, TBL_APPLY A WHERE ((A.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND C.TOEFL = A.AC_SCORE AND A.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO AND S.SUB_NAME = 'TOEFL') OR (A.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND C.TEPS = A.AC_SCORE AND A.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO AND S.SUB_NAME = 'TEPS') OR (A.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND C.TOEIC_S = A.AC_SCORE AND A.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO AND S.SUB_NAME = 'TOEIC Speaking'))),0) AS CONVERSION_SCORE FROM TBL_SUBJECT S , TBL_APPLY A WHERE S.SUB_NO = A.SUB_NO AND A.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND A.APPLY_STATE = '승인'

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_NAME , A.SUBTOTAL , A.MISTOTAL , (SUBTOTAL+MISTOTAL) AS TOTAL FROM( SELECT USER_NO, SUM(SUBTOTAL) AS SUBTOTAL, SUM(MISTOTAL) AS MISTOTAL FROM( SELECT USER_NO , 0 AS SUBTOTAL , SUM(MISTOTAL) AS MISTOTAL FROM ( SELECT USER_NO, SUM(MIS_ATT_NO) AS MISTOTAL FROM ( SELECT USER_NO , COUNT(MIS_ATT_NO)*3 AS MIS_ATT_NO FROM TBL_MIS_ATT GROUP BY USER_NO UNION SELECT USER_NO , SUM(MIS_ATT_TIMES)*3 AS MIS_ATT_NO FROM TBL_MIS_SCORE GROUP BY USER_NO UNION SELECT USER_NO, 0 AS MIS_ATT_NO FROM TBL_USER WHERE AUTHORITY != 1 GROUP BY USER_NO ) GROUP BY USER_NO ) GROUP BY USER_NO UNION SELECT USER_NO , SUM(AC_SCORE) AS SUBTOTAL , 0 AS MISTOTAL FROM ( SELECT U.USER_NO , SUM(TOEIC) AS AC_SCORE FROM TBL_CONVERSION_SCORE C, TBL_APPLY A, TBL_SUBJECT S, TBL_USER U WHERE (A.USER_NO = U.USER_NO AND C.TOEFL = A.AC_SCORE AND A.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO AND S.SUB_NAME = 'TOEFL') OR (A.USER_NO = U.USER_NO AND C.TEPS = A.AC_SCORE AND A.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO AND S.SUB_NAME = 'TEPS') OR (A.USER_NO = U.USER_NO AND C.TOEIC_S = A.AC_SCORE AND A.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO AND S.SUB_NAME = 'TOEIC Speaking') GROUP BY U.USER_NO UNION SELECT U.USER_NO , SUM(AC_SCORE) AS AC_SCORE FROM TBL_APPLY A, TBL_USER U WHERE A.USER_NO = U.USER_NO AND APPLY_STATE = '승인' GROUP BY U.USER_NO UNION SELECT U.USER_NO , -SUM(AC_SCORE) AS AC_SCORE FROM TBL_APPLY A, TBL_SUBJECT S, TBL_USER U WHERE A.USER_NO = U.USER_NO AND A.APPLY_STATE = '승인' AND( (A.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO AND S.SUB_NAME = 'TOEFL') OR (A.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO AND S.SUB_NAME = 'TEPS') OR (A.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO AND S.SUB_NAME = 'TOEIC Speaking') ) GROUP BY U.USER_NO UNION SELECT USER_NO , 0 AS AC_SCORE FROM TBL_USER WHERE AUTHORITY != 1 GROUP BY USER_NO ) GROUP BY USER_NO UNION SELECT USER_NO , 0 AS SUBTOTAL , 0 AS MISTOTAL FROM TBL_USER WHERE AUTHORITY != 1 GROUP BY USER_NO) GROUP BY USER_NO ) A, TBL_USER U WHERE A.USER_NO = U.USER_NO ORDER BY U.USER_NO ASC
